Package ePortfolio

Class MutualFund

java.lang.Object
ePortfolio.Investment
ePortfolio.MutualFund
public class MutualFund extends Investment
An investment program funded by shareholders that trades in diversified holdings and is professionally managed.

  • Constructor Details

    • MutualFund

      public MutualFund(String fundSymbol, String fundName, int fundQuantity, double fundPrice)
      Initialize a mutual fund. The book value will be automatically calculated based on price and quantity and no commissions involved.
      Parameters:
      fundSymbol - A ticker code that uniquely identifies the mutual fund
      fundName - Registered name of the mutual fund in the exchange
      fundQuantity - Quantity purchased by a shareholder
      fundPrice - Price spent by the shareholder to purchase this number of mutual fund shares
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any of the fields are in violation

    • MutualFund

      public MutualFund(String fundSymbol, String fundName, int fundQuantity, double fundPrice, double bookValue)
      Initialize a mutual fund. The book value will be automatically calculated based on price and quantity and no commissions involved.
      Parameters:
      fundSymbol - A ticker code that uniquely identifies the mutual fund
      fundName - Registered name of the mutual fund in the exchange
      fundQuantity - Quantity purchased by a shareholder
      fundPrice - Price spent by the shareholder to purchase this number of mutual fund shares
      bookValue - Market value of the investment.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any of the fields are in violation

  • Method Details

    • reduce

      public double reduce(int reduceQuantity)
      Reduce the number of shares. The shares will be sold back to the fund manager in exchange of cash based on current prices.
      Overrides:
      reduce in class Investment
      Parameters:
      reduceQuantity - Number of shares to dispose
      Returns:
      Total amount converted to cash
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the quantity is invalid or the number of shares available is not enough
